DOC.criteria: Obese otherwise healthy female Nonchildbearing potential ( surgically sterile , postmenopausal , receive implant injectable contraceptive least 3 month ) BMI ≥ 30 ≤ 45 kg/m2 Stable body weight past 2 month Use weight loss agent past month History eat disorder History type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus Current smoker
